original_text: A person who believes in me may not seem important. But you should never make that person do wrong things. Do not do that! It would be better if someone tied a big stone around your neck and then he threw you into the sea!
korean_text: 또 누구든지 나를 믿는 이 작은 자들 중 하나라도 실족하게 하면 차라리 연자맷돌이 그 목에 매여 바다에 던져지는 것이 나으리라

sentences.original_text: A person who believes in me
But you should never make that person

sentences.korean_translation: 잘못된 일을 하게 해서는 안 된다

sentences.original_text: if someone tied a big stone around your neck
sentences.korean_translation: 누군가 네 목에 큰 돌을 묶고

sentences.original_text: and then he threw you into the sea
